(as of Nov 30,2022 07:12:33 UTC – Details)



【High-Performance Processor】Beelink MINI S built-in faster 11 generation Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5095 base frequency 2.0GHz, up to 2.9 GHz. (4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually home entertainment, streaming video, Web browsing, work, and games.
【Storage Expansion Options】The MINI S Mini Computer built-in 8 GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA/HDD in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance) and supports up to 2TB of 2.5-inch SATA HDD / SSD.
【Support 4K Dual Screen Display】The Mini Computer equipped with Intel UHD Graphics to support support 4K FPS video playback, which brings you first-class viewing .Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time,thereby reducing waiting time and improving your work efficiency.
【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

What makes our products unique?

From the brand

PetLab Co. Products

How did we get our start?

PetLab Co. was formed with a simple mission: to provide comfort and support for pets.

What makes our products unique?

If an ingredient is not beneficial then you won’t find it in our products. We work alongside experts to ensure that each ingredient is purposeful and up to our high standards.

Why do we love what we do?

Motivated by results and happy customers, we have created products that make a difference in both owners’ and pets’ lives. Producing delicious, simple, and effective supplements to support a healthy and active life.

EASY TO APPLY: This paw soother balm comes in an easy-to-use twist stick, so you can quickly apply it to your pup’s paws before and after walks
MOISTURIZING DOG PAW BALM: In addition to soothing and moisturizing, this paw wax can also support your dog’s paws by providing a barrier from internal and external irritants
WORKS ALL YEAR LONG: Our dog paw moisturizer is ideal for both summer months, when paw licking can be at its height, and winter months, when paw dryness is more common
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Thanks to its natural ingredients like organic shea butter and coconut oil, this dog paw balm is not only beneficial, but it’s also gentle
PREMIUM PRODUCTS – Our dog health supplies are exclusively manufactured in the USA with domestically and globally sourced ingredients

Product Description

Stay productive

High performance

With a small form factor, the Dell OptiPlex 7040 is designed to save desktop space while still providing the performance you need to stay productive.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core i7 6700 processors, 16G DDR4 ram, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 7040 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 3.4 GHz Turbo 4.0 GHz Memory: 16GB DDR4 Storage: 512GB SSD Port: USB 3.0, DisplayPort, HDMI, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 7040 like DP port, a HDMI port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Multi display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core i7-6700 3.4 GHz up to 4.0 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 7040 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 16 G DDR4 memory with Strictly selected particles.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

512 GB Solid state drive

The OptiPlex 7040 comes with 512G SSD support faster Boot speed and faster storage rates.

This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high-performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com.
Support 4K (3840×2160) Dual display, makes it easy to connect two monitors at the same time, and you can expand working Windows, mirror content, or expand a single window across multiple monitors.
Ports: 1 X RJ-45, 4 x USB 2.0, 6 x USB 3.0, 1 x HDMI, 1 x DP.
